name: Notification of Change of Supplier
description: Notification of Change of Supplier
receiver: Incoming Supplier (SUP), Marketwide Data Service (MDS), LDSO
context: Following a successful Change of Supplier, the CSS will notify this to the Registration Service. The Registration Service will then notify parties that a successful Change of Supplier has taken place. This provides the Gaining Supplier with key information about the MPAN as it currently exists in the Registration Service.

data_items.name: Interface Id
data_items.rule: Interface Id | Notes: IF-001

data_items.name: Schema Version
data_items.rule: The Scheme Version against which the message has been constructed | Notes: nnn

data_items.name: Event Code
data_items.rule: Code used to identify the nature of the Event | Notes: [InitialRegistration], [ChangeOfSupplier]

data_items.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

data_items.name: MPAN Core
data_items.rule: A business key used to uniquely identify the metering point that is the subject of the update.

data_items.name: Distributor DIP ID
data_items.rule: The DIP ID of the distributor who is responsible for the distribution network that a metering point is connected to.

data_items.name: GSP Group ID
data_items.rule: Identifies the distinct grid supply point group (physical region of the country) where the metering point is located.

data_items.name: CSS Registration ID
data_items.rule: The CSS identifier associated with a Supplier's Registration

data_items.title: B002 - Incoming Supplier Information - Mandatory for Event [ChangeOfSupplier] & [InitialRegistration]

data_items.name: Incoming Supplier DIP ID
data_items.rule: The market-wide unique reference for a supplier that is responsible for the settlement liabilities.

data_items.name: Incoming Supplier MPID
data_items.rule: Incoming Supplier MPID

data_items.name: Supplier Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The date and time from which a supplier came into effect, with regard to their relationship with the metering point. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.title: B003 - Outgoing Supplier Information - Mandatory for Event [ChangeOfSupplier]

data_items.name: Outgoing Supplier DIP ID
data_items.rule: The market-wide unique reference for a supplier that is responsible for the settlement liabilities.

data_items.name: Outgoing Supplier MPID
data_items.rule: Outgoing Supplier MPID

data_items.name: Outgoing Supplier Effective To Date
data_items.rule: The last inclusive settlement date after which a Supplier's registration to a metering system ceases to be valid. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Domestic Premise Indicator
data_items.rule:
A flag that indicates if the MPAN of the registration appointment is used to identify a domestic premise. | Notes: T= True (Domestic)
F= False (Non-Domestic)

data_items.name: Domestic Premise Indicator Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The date from which the metering point Domestic Premise Indicator is in effect.

data_items.title: B005 - Incumbent / Outgoing Service Providers (Mandatory for [ChangeOfSupplier] (where available in Registration Service)

data_items.name: Current Metering Service DIP ID
data_items.rule: DIP ID of the Metering Service Appointed at the point message was created by the Registration Service, i.e. the Currently Appointed Metering Service

data_items.name: Current Metering Service MPID
data_items.rule: Metering Service MPID

data_items.name: Current Data Service DIP ID
data_items.rule: DIP ID of the Data Service Appointed at the point message was created by the Registration Service, i.e. the Currently Appointed Data Service

data_items.name: Current Data Service MPID
data_items.rule: Current Data Service MPID

data_items.title: B006 - Customer Direct Contracts (Mandatory if Customer Direct Contract is Registered/Recorded)

data_items.name: Customer Direct Contract Metering Service
data_items.rule: An indicator to show if a direct customer contract exists between the customer and the Metering Service provider. | Notes: Y/N

data_items.name: Customer Direct Contract Metering Service DIP ID
data_items.rule: The DIP ID of the Metering Service that has recorded the existence of a Customer Direct Contract for that MPAN.

data_items.name: Customer Direct Contract Data Service
data_items.rule: An indicator to show if a direct customer contract exists between the customer and Data Service provider. | Notes: Y/N

data_items.name: Customer Direct Contract Data Service DIP ID
data_items.rule: The DIP ID of the Data Service that has recorded the existence of a Customer Direct Contract for that MPAN.

data_items.name: Metering Point Postcode
data_items.rule: The full postcode of the metering point site.

data_items.name: Address Line 1
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address. There are defined parts of the address for each address line.

data_items.name: Address Line 2
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 3
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 4
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 5
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 6
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 7
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 8
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Address Line 9
data_items.rule: A component of a metering point site address

data_items.name: Connection Type Indicator
data_items.rule:
A code to indicate the type of connection at the metering point. | Notes: W - Whole Current
L - LV with CT
H - HV with CT
E - EHV with CT
U - Unmetered

data_items.name: Connection Type Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The date and time from which the metering point Connection Type is in effect. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Energy Direction
data_items.rule:
Indicates the direction of energy at a metering point. 
Values can be I = import / E = export. | Notes: I = Import
E = Export

data_items.name: Metered Indicator
data_items.rule:
An indicator to show whether the Consumption Component is for a metered supply or unmetered supply. | Notes: False = U - Unmetered, 
True = M - Metered

data_items.name: DUOS Tariff ID
data_items.rule: Reference to identify the DUoS Tariff assigned to an MPAN

data_items.name: DUOS Tariff ID EffectiveFrom Date
data_items.rule: Date on which DUoS Tariff came into effect | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Energisation Status
data_items.rule:
Indicates if the metering point is considered energised (i.e. connected to the distribution system) and therefore active for settlement purposes. | Notes: D - De-Energised
E - Energised

data_items.name: Energisation Status Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The settlement date and time from which an energisation status is in effect for a metering system. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Market Segment Indicator
data_items.rule:
An enumeration of Smart/Advanced/Unmetered. | Notes: S = Smart/Traditional
A = Advanced
U = Unmetered

data_items.name: Market Segment Indicator Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The date from which the metering point Market Segment is in effect. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.title: B027- Assumed Annual Consumption (Mandatory where available in Registration Service)

data_items.name: Annual Consumption
data_items.rule: ECS Calculated Annual Consumption (kWh) | Notes: eg. 123456789.123

data_items.name: Annual Consumption EffectiveFrom Date
data_items.rule: Date on which Assumed Annual Consumption was Calculated/is Effective From

data_items.name: Annual Consumption Quality Indicator
data_items.rule:
Assumed Annual Consumption Quality Indicator | Notes: A= 100% Actual data
1 = > 75% Actual data
2 = <75% Actual data
3 = 100% Estimated data#
4 = > 50% no data
5 = < 50% no data
D= Default

data_items.title: B029 - DCC Enrolment Status (Conditionally Mandatory - Required only for Smart Meters if available)

data_items.name: DCC Service Flag
data_items.rule:
A DCC provided flag to indicate the status of the services being provided by the DCC to a Metering Point. | Notes: A = Active
I = Installed Not Commissioned
N = Non-Active

data_items.name: DCC Effective From Date (DCCF)
data_items.rule: The first inclusive calendar date for which the status of the DCC Service flag applies. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: IHD Install Status
data_items.rule:
Information regarding the In Home Display at a metering point. | Notes: I = Installed
D = Declined
E = Existing 
F = Failed

data_items.name: IHD Status Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The first inclusive calendar date that an a notable IHD status was provided. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: SMSO
data_items.rule: The Id of the operator a Supplier has procured data and communication services from in respect of a Metering System (applies only to certain types of SMETS1 Metering).

data_items.name: SMSO Status Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The first inclusive calendar date that a Smart Metering System Operator ID is the provider of communications services to a Metering System (applies only to certain types of SMETS1 Metering). | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.title: B032 - MPAN Legacy Info (Mandatory for Traditional Meters / Optional for other Meters OR where not available in Registration Service)

data_items.name: Profile Class
data_items.rule: A legacy classification, maintined by Suppliers, retained soley to assist with the undertsading of allocation of gross consumption to individual Settlement Periods.

data_items.name: Profile Class Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The Date from which the current Profile Class became Effective | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: SSC
data_items.rule: A legacy classification, maintined by Suppliers, retained soley to assist with the undertsading of allocation of gross consumption to individual Settlement Periods.

data_items.name: SSC Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The Date from which the current Profile Class became Effective | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.rule: When this metering point is part of an import/export pair, this identifies the related import or export metering point. data_items.name: Primary MPAN
data_items.rule: The primary in a related MPAN relationship. The primary is associated with the base load settlement configuration (contains no value, if not part of related MPAN pair).

data_items.rule: The secondary in a related MPAN relationship.

data_items.title: *B905 - B074 and B075 Blocks below are repeated for each Installed Meter
B074 - MPAN Existing Meter Info (Mandatory if Metering Installed)

data_items.name: Meter ID
data_items.rule: Serial number of the physical meter. | Notes: MSID for the 'existing' or 'newly installed' meter depending on Event type

data_items.name: Meter Type
data_items.rule: The type of meter, in relation to its capabilities. E.g. AMR.S1, S2, S2ADE | Notes: Values as per ISD

data_items.name: Manufacturers Make and Type
data_items.rule: The manufacturer's make name and type number of a Meter

data_items.name: Electricity Smart Meter Equipment (ESME ID)
data_items.rule: The Electricity Smart Meter Equipment GUID is the unique identifier for a Smart electricity This is also known as the DCC GUID and is further defined within the DCC interface specifications. | Notes: Mandatory for Smart Meters(XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX)

data_items.name: Meter Location
data_items.rule: The actual location of the metering system within the site | Notes: Values as Per Data Catalogue

data_items.name: Number of Displayed Register Digits
data_items.rule: The number of digits prior to the decimal point displayed by the total cumulative register of a smart meter | Notes: Mandatory for SMETS2 Meters Where the Meter Type is S1 the Number of Displayed Register Digits value must be be per the manufacturer's specification Where the Meter Type is S2A, S2AD, S2ADE, 2ADF, 2ADEF, 2AEF, 2AF, S2B, S2BD, S2BDE, 2BF,2BDF, 2BDEF or 2BEF the value must be “5”. Where the Meter Type is prefixed with “S2C” the value must be “6”. Where the Meter Type is 2CDEF, 2CF, 2CDF or 2CEF the value must be “6”

data_items.name: Meter Installation Date/Time
data_items.rule: The date of installation for a meter at a metering point. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Meter Asset Provider Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The inclusive calendar date from which the meter asset provider is in effect for the metering system. | Notes: Must be a valid date and time

data_items.name: UTC Period Consumption Value {v}
data_items.rule: Consumption Value (kWh/kVARh) for the UTC Period Duration. | Notes: nnnnnnnnn.nnn

data_items.name: Settlement Period Quality Indicator {q}
data_items.rule:
Describes if the UTC Period Consumption Value is an actual or what estimation method was used to estimate it. | Notes: A = Actual, E= Estimate (UMS Only) A1,A2,A3, AAE1,AAE2,AAE3,EAE1,EAE2,EAE3 (ADV Only) E0 --> E9 = Estimation Method 1 - 9 EA1-->EA13 = ADS Estimation Methods ZE = De-Energised (for use with Unmetered Supplies only) ZE1--> ZE3 = Zero Estimation Method 1 -3

Ref Data Service Estimation Method Statement for additional guidance

data_items.name: Estimation Reason Code {e}
data_items.rule:
Reason why Data Service had to provide Estimated/Zero Data | Notes: Madatory if SPQI (DI-083) is not 'A' 1=Opt Out 2=Missing 3=Invalid 4=Comms Fault 5=LTV 6=Disabled 7=De-Energised 8=Disconnected 9=Consumption Amendment 10=Non-Smart

Ref Data Service Estimation Method Statement for additional guidance

data_items.rule: DIP ID of the Supplier Responsible for the Linked MPAN | Notes: Mandatory if available in Registration Service

data_items.name: Import/Export MPAN Supplier MPID
data_items.rule: Import/Export MPAN Supplier MPID | Notes: Mandatory if available in Registration Service

data_items.title: > *B036 - Linked Import/Export Meter Details - *B910 B036 & B075 below repeated for each Meter /MAP pair

data_items.name: Meter ID
data_items.rule: Serial number of the physical meter. | Notes: MSID for the 'existing' or 'newly installed' meter depending on Event type

data_items.name: Meter Type
data_items.rule: The type of meter, in relation to its capabilities. E.g. AMR.S1, S2, S2ADE | Notes: Values as per ISD

data_items.name: Manufacturers Make and Type
data_items.rule: The manufacturer's make name and type number of a Meter

data_items.name: Electricity Smart Meter Equipment (ESME ID)
data_items.rule: The Electricity Smart Meter Equipment GUID is the unique identifier for a Smart electricity This is also known as the DCC GUID and is further defined within the DCC interface specifications. | Notes: Mandatory for Smart Meters (XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX)

data_items.name: Meter Location
data_items.rule: The actual location of the metering system within the site | Notes: Values as Per Data Catalogue

data_items.name: Number of Displayed Register Digits
data_items.rule:
The number of digits prior to the decimal point displayed by the total cumulative register of a smart meter | Notes: Mandatory for SMETS2 Meters Where the Meter Type is S1 the Number of Displayed Register Digits value must be be per the manufacturer's specification

Where the Meter Type is S2A, S2AD, S2ADE, 2ADF, 2ADEF, 2AEF, 2AF, S2B, S2BD, S2BDE, 2BF,2BDF, 2BDEF or 2BEF the value must be “5”.

Where the Meter Type is prefixed with “S2C” the value must be “6”.

Where the Meter Type is 2CDEF, 2CF, 2CDF or 2CEF the value must be “6”

data_items.name: Meter Installation Date/Time
data_items.rule: The date of installation for a meter at a metering point. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.title: >> *B075 - MPAN Linked Meter Map Info (Mandatory for each Meter Provided) - Most Recent Record only for each B036 Meter provided above

data_items.name: Meter Asset Provider ID
data_items.rule: The market-wide reference for the provider of the meter equipment. | Notes: Must be a valid set as per ISD

data_items.name: Meter Asset Provider Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The inclusive calendar date from which the meter asset provider is in effect for the metering system. | Notes: Must be a valid date and time

name: Provide Settlement Period Consumption
description: Data Service will provide Actual or Estimated UTC Settlement Period Consumption data (Active and where appropriate Reactive), for each MPAN, for each day that they are appointed.
sender: Data Services - Smart Data Service (SDS) / Advanced Data Service (ADS) / UMSDS
receiver: Load Shaping Service (LSS) / Market-wide Data Service (MDS) / Distributor (LDSO) / Supplier (SUP)
context: Data Service will provide Actual or Estimated UTC Settlement Period Consumption data (Active and where appropriate Reactive), for each MPAN, for each day that they are appointed.

data_items.name: Interface Id
data_items.rule: Interface Id | Notes: IF-021

data_items.name: Schema Version
data_items.rule: The Scheme Version against which the message has been constructed | Notes: nnn

data_items.name: Event Code
data_items.rule: Code used to identify the nature of the Event | Notes: [ActivePower], [ReactivePower]

data_items.title: D0- Transactional Info - DIP Set (Added by DIP - Mandatory)

data_items.name: MPAN Core
data_items.rule: A business key used to uniquely identify the metering point that is the subject of the update.

data_items.name: Distributor DIP ID
data_items.rule: The DIP ID of the distributor who is responsible for the distribution network that a metering point is connected to.

data_items.name: GSP Group ID
data_items.rule: Identifies the distinct grid supply point group (physical region of the country) where the metering point is located.

data_items.name: Issuing Data Service DIP ID
data_items.rule: DIP ID of the Data Service submitting the data

data_items.name: Connection Type Indicator
data_items.rule: A code to indicate the type of connection at the metering point. | Notes: W - Whole Current L - LV with CT H - HV with CT E - EHV with CT U - Unmetered

data_items.name: Connection Type Effective FromDate
data_items.rule: The date and time from which the metering point Connection Type is in effect. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Measurement Quantity ID
data_items.rule: Identifies the type of the quantity that is measured by the UTC Period Consumption Value. | Notes: AI – Active import AE – Active export RI – Reactive import RE – Reactive export

data_items.title: > *B046 - UTC Settlement Day (Mandatory) - Block below Repeated for each UTC Settlement Date

data_items.name: UTC Settlement Date
data_items.rule: UTC Date for which the data applies | Notes: Should be populated with a time of Midnight for the UTC Day to which consumption applies

data_items.name: Settlement Period Duration
data_items.rule: The settlement period duration in minutes. | Notes: nn

data_items.title: >> *B047- UTC Settlement Period Consumption Data (Mandatory) - Block below Repeated for each UTC Settlement Consumption Period as Required

data_items.name: Settlement Period Effective To Date/Time {sp}
data_items.rule: The UTC end date and time of the settlement period for a consumption value. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: UTC Period Consumption Value {v}
data_items.rule: Consumption Value (kWh/kVARh) for the Settlement Period Duration. | Notes: nnnnnnnnn.nnn

data_items.name: Settlement Period Quality Indicator {q}
data_items.rule:
Describes if the UTC Period Consumption Value is an actual or what estimation method was used to estimate it. | Notes: A = Actual, E= Estimate (UMS Only) A1,A2,A3, AAE1,AAE2,AAE3,EAE1,EAE2,EAE3 (ADV Only) E0 --> E9 = Estimation Method 1 - 9 EA1-->EA13 = ADS Estimation Methods ZE = De-Energised (for use with Unmetered Supplies only) ZE1--> ZE3 = Zero Estimation Method 1 -3

Ref Data Service Estimation Method Statement for additional guidance

data_items.name: Estimation Reason Code {e}
data_items.rule:
Reason why Data Service had to provide Estimated/Zero Data | Notes: Mandatory if SPQI (DI-083) is not 'A' 1=Opt Out 2=Missing 3=Invalid 4=Comms Fault 5=LTV 6=Disabled 7=De-Energised 8=Disconnected 9=Consumption Amendment 10=Non-Smart

Ref Data Service Estimation Method Statement for additional guidance

data_items.name: Supplier Consumption Amendment Reason Code {arc}
data_items.rule: Supplier Consumption Amendment Reason Code | Notes: Required if DI-076 is Cons Amendment A= Agreed Read E = Estimation Issue M = Metering Issue (Crossed/Missed Exchange/Found) R = Reading Issue (Transposed / Misread) S = Stolen/Lost Meter T = Tampering/Theft X = Other

name: Provide Load Shape Period Data
description: Central settlement will calculate Settlement Period Load Shapes on a daily basis. These new load shapes are created for each UTC Settlement Period of a UTC Settlement Date and must be delivered to the Data Services, within agreed timescales, so as to allow for Data Service Validation & Estimation processes to operate in an accurate & timely fashion.
receiver: Supplier (SUP), Data Services (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Public (via separate file-sharing mechanism)
context: Central settlement will calculate Settlement Period Load Shapes on a daily basis. These new load shapes are created for each UTC Settlement Period of a UTC Settlement Date and must be delivered to the Data Services, within agreed timescales, so as to allow for Data Service Validation & Estimation processes to operate in an accurate & timely fashion.

data_items.rule: The sum of all Period Values for the UTC Date. | Notes: nnnnnnnnn.nnn

data_items.name: Load Shape Day Peak Total
data_items.rule: The sum of Period Values (kWh) for settlement periods (15 to 48) or (1 and 16 to 48). UTC times 7pm - Midnight | Notes: Smart Only nnnnnnnnn.nnn

data_items.name: Load Shape Day Off-Peak Total
data_items.rule: The sum of Period Values for settlement periods (kWh) (1 to 14) or (2 to 15). UTC times Midnight -7pm | Notes: Smart Only nnnnnnnnn.nnn

data_items.name: Load Shape 7 Day Rolling Total
data_items.rule: The sum of the 7 day rolling total (kWh) using the total for the UTC date plus the previous 6 UTC dates | Notes: nnnnnnnnn.nnn

data_items.name: Load Shape 7 Day Rolling Peak Total
data_items.rule: The sum of the 7 day rolling Peak total (kWh) using the Peak total for the UTC date plus the last 6 UTC dates | Notes: Smart Only nnnnnnnnn.nnn

data_items.name: Load Shape 7 Day Rolling Off-peak Total
data_items.rule: The sum of the 7 day rolling Off-Peak total (kWh) using the Off-Peak total for the UTC date plus the last 6 UTC dates | Notes: Smart Only nnnnnnnnn.nnn

data_items.rule: A code to indicate the type of connection at the metering point. | Notes: W - Whole Current L - LV with CT H - HV with CT E - EHV with CT U - Unmetered

data_items.name: Connection Type Effective FromDate
data_items.rule: The date and time from which the metering point Connection Type is in effect. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Energy Direction
data_items.rule: Indicates the direction of energy at a metering point. Values can be I = import / E = export. | Notes: I = Import E = Export

data_items.name: Metered Indicator
data_items.rule: An indicator to show whether the Consumption Component is for a metered supply or unmetered supply. | Notes: False = U - Unmetered, True = M - Metered

data_items.name: DUOS Tariff ID
data_items.rule: Reference to identify the DUoS Tariff assigned to an MPAN

data_items.name: DUOS Tariff ID EffectiveFrom Date
data_items.rule: Date on which DUoS Tariff came into effect | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Energisation Status
data_items.rule: Indicates if the metering point is considered energised (i.e. connected to the distribution system) and therefore active for settlement purposes. | Notes: D - De-Energised E - Energised

data_items.name: Energisation Status Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The settlement date and time from which an energisation status is in effect for a metering system. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Market Segment Indicator
data_items.rule: An enumeration of Smart/Advanced/Unmetered. | Notes: S = Smart/Traditional A = Advanced U = Unmetered

data_items.name: Market Segment Indicator Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The date from which the metering point Market Segment is in effect. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: DCC Effective From Date (DCCF)
data_items.rule: The first inclusive calendar date for which the status of the DCC Service flag applies. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: SMSO (Smart Metering System Operator)

data_items.rule: The first inclusive calendar date that a Smart Metering System Operator ID is the provider of communications services to a Metering System (applies only to certain types of SMETS1 Metering). | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.title: B905* - B074 and B075 Blocks below are repeated for each Installed Meter
B074 - MPAN Existing Meter Info (Mandatory if Metering Installed)

data_items.name: Meter ID
data_items.rule: Serial number of the physical meter. | Notes: MSID for the 'existing' or 'newly installed' meter depending on Event type

data_items.name: Meter Type
data_items.rule: The type of meter, in relation to its capabilities. E.g. AMR.S1, S2, S2ADE | Notes: Values as per ISD

data_items.name: Manufacturers Make and Type
data_items.rule: The manufacturer's make name and type number of a Meter

data_items.name: Electricity Smart Meter Equipment (ESME ID)
data_items.rule: The Electricity Smart Meter Equipment GUID is the unique identifier for a Smart electricity This is also known as the DCC GUID and is further defined within the DCC interface specifications. | Notes: Mandatory for Smart Meters (XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX)

data_items.name: Meter Location
data_items.rule: The actual location of the metering system within the site | Notes: Values as Per Data Catalogue

data_items.name: Number of Displayed Register Digits
data_items.rule:
The number of digits prior to the decimal point displayed by the total cumulative register of a smart meter | Notes: Mandatory for SMETS2 Meters Where the Meter Type is S1 the Number of Displayed Register Digits value must be be per the manufacturer's specification

Where the Meter Type is S2A, S2AD, S2ADE, 2ADF, 2ADEF, 2AEF, 2AF, S2B, S2BD, S2BDE, 2BF,2BDF, 2BDEF or 2BEF the value must be “5”.

Where the Meter Type is prefixed with “S2C” the value must be “6”.

Where the Meter Type is 2CDEF, 2CF, 2CDF or 2CEF the value must be “6”

data_items.name: Meter Installation Date/Time
data_items.rule: The date of installation for a meter at a metering point. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Meter ID
data_items.rule: Serial number of the physical meter. | Notes: MSID for the 'existing' or 'newly installed' meter depending on Event type

data_items.name: Meter Type
data_items.rule: The type of meter, in relation to its capabilities. E.g. AMR.S1, S2, S2ADE | Notes: Values as per ISD

data_items.name: Manufacturers Make and Type
data_items.rule: The manufacturer's make name and type number of a Meter

data_items.name: Electricity Smart Meter Equipment (ESME ID)
data_items.rule: The Electricity Smart Meter Equipment GUID is the unique identifier for a Smart electricity This is also known as the DCC GUID and is further defined within the DCC interface specifications. | Notes: Mandatory for Smart Meters (XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX)

data_items.name: Meter Location
data_items.rule: The actual location of the metering system within the site | Notes: Values as Per Data Catalogue

data_items.name: Number of Displayed Register Digits
data_items.rule:
The number of digits prior to the decimal point displayed by the total cumulative register of a smart meter | Notes: Mandatory for SMETS2 Meters Where the Meter Type is S1 the Number of Displayed Register Digits value must be be per the manufacturer's specification

Where the Meter Type is S2A, S2AD, S2ADE, 2ADF, 2ADEF, 2AEF, 2AF, S2B, S2BD, S2BDE, 2BF,2BDF, 2BDEF or 2BEF the value must be “5”.

Where the Meter Type is prefixed with “S2C” the value must be “6”.

Where the Meter Type is 2CDEF, 2CF, 2CDF or 2CEF the value must be “6”

data_items.name: Meter Installation Date/Time
data_items.rule: The date of installation for a meter at a metering point. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.rule: The market-wide reference for the provider of the meter equipment. | Notes: Must be a valid set as per ISD

data_items.name: Meter Asset Provider Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The inclusive calendar date from which the meter asset provider is in effect for the metering system. | Notes: Must be a valid date and time

name: Notification of Service Provider Appointment Status
description: Registration Service Notification on Appointment Status. This could be that Appointment has been Accepted or Rejected by Service Provider; has become Lapsed (i.e. could not be successfully matched with a SecuredActive Switch). It is also used to advise the Incumbent Metering Service to issue MTDs to incoming Service Providers.
receiver: Supplier (SUP), Incumbent Metering Service, Data Service (ADS, SDS, UMSDS), Metering Service (MSA, MSS, UMSO)
context: Registration Service Notification on Appointment Status. This could be that Appointment has been Accepted or Rejected by Service Provider; has become Lapsed (i.e. could not be successfully matched with a SecuredActive Switch). It is also used to advise the Incumbent Metering Service to issue MTDs to incoming Service Providers.

data_items.rule: Indicates the direction of energy at a metering point. Values can be I = import / E = export. | Notes: I = Import E = Export

data_items.rule: The date from which the consent granularity was in effect. | Notes: MDS &LDSO&MS YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.title: B029 - DCC Enrolment Status (Conditionally Mandatory - Required only for Smart Meters if available)

data_items.name: DCC Service Flag
data_items.rule: A DCC provided flag to indicate the status of the services being provided by the DCC to a Metering Point. | Notes: A = Active I = Installed Not Commissioned N = Non-Active

data_items.name: DCC Effective From Date (DCCF)
data_items.rule: The first inclusive calendar date for which the status of the DCC Service flag applies. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: IHD Install Status
data_items.rule: Information regarding the In Home Display at a metering point. | Notes: I = Installed D = Declined E = Existing F = Failed

data_items.name: IHD Status Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The first inclusive calendar date that an a notable IHD status was provided. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: SMSO (Smart Metering System Operator)
data_items.rule: The Id of the operator a Supplier has procured data and communication services from in respect of a Metering System (applies only to certain types of SMETS1 Metering).

data_items.name: SMSO EffectiveFrom Date
data_items.rule: The first inclusive calendar date that a Smart Metering System Operator ID is the provider of communications services to a Metering System (applies only to certain types of SMETS1 Metering). | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.title: B032 - MPAN Legacy Info (Mandatory for Traditional Meters / Optional for other Meters OR where not available in Registration Service)

data_items.name: Profile Class
data_items.rule: A legacy classification, maintined by Suppliers, retained soley to assist with the undertsading of allocation of gross consumption to individual Settlement Periods. | Notes: Mandatory for Traditional Meters

data_items.name: Profile Class Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The Date from which the current Profile Class became Effective | Notes: Required if [DI-122] not null YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: SSC
data_items.rule: A legacy classification, maintined by Suppliers, retained soley to assist with the undertsading of allocation of gross consumption to individual Settlement Periods. | Notes: Mandatory for Traditional Meters

data_items.name: SSC Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The Date from which the current Profile Class became Effective | Notes: Required if [DI-123] not null YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.title: B905 - B074 and B075 Blocks below are repeated for each Installed Meter
B074 - Existing MPAN Meter Details (Mandatory if Metering Installed)

data_items.name: Meter ID
data_items.rule: Serial number of the physical meter. | Notes: MSID for the 'existing' or 'newly installed' meter depending on Event type

data_items.name: Meter Type
data_items.rule: The type of meter, in relation to its capabilities. E.g. AMR.S1, S2, S2ADE | Notes: Values as per ISD

data_items.name: Manufacturers Make and Type
data_items.rule: The manufacturer's make name and type number of a Meter

data_items.name: Electricity Smart Meter Equipment (ESME ID)
data_items.rule: The Electricity Smart Meter Equipment GUID is the unique identifier for a Smart electricity This is also known as the DCC GUID and is further defined within the DCC interface specifications. | Notes: Mandatory for Smart Meters (XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX-XX)

data_items.name: Meter Location
data_items.rule: The actual location of the metering system within the site | Notes: Values as Per Data Catalogue

data_items.name: Number of Displayed Register Digits
data_items.rule:
The number of digits prior to the decimal point displayed by the total cumulative register of a smart meter | Notes: Mandatory for SMETS2 Meters Where the Meter Type is S1 the Number of Displayed Register Digits value must be be per the manufacturer's specification

Where the Meter Type is S2A, S2AD, S2ADE, 2ADF, 2ADEF, 2AEF, 2AF, S2B, S2BD, S2BDE, 2BF,2BDF, 2BDEF or 2BEF the value must be “5”.

Where the Meter Type is prefixed with “S2C” the value must be “6”.

Where the Meter Type is 2CDEF, 2CF, 2CDF or 2CEF the value must be “6”

data_items.name: Meter Installation Date/Time
data_items.rule: The date of installation for a meter at a metering point. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.title: > B075 - Existing Meter MAP Info (Mandatory for each Meter Provided) - Most Recent Record only for each B074 Meter provided above

data_items.name: Meter Asset Provider ID
data_items.rule: The market-wide reference for the provider of the meter equipment. | Notes: Must be a valid set as per ISD

data_items.name: Meter Asset Provider Effective From Date
data_items.rule: The inclusive calendar date from which the meter asset provider is in effect for the metering system. | Notes: Must be a valid date and time

data_items.title: B035 block below are repeated for each Linked Import/Export MPAN
B035 - Linked Import / Export MPAN (Mandatory if Linked MPAN Exists)

data_items.name: Linked Import/Export MPAN
data_items.rule: When this metering point is part of an import/export pair, this identifies the related import or export metering point. Where more than one import MPAN exists, this shall be populated with the Primary Import MPAN. | Notes: This field is mandatory, but will be Null/Blank if no linkage exists.

data_items.name: Linked MPAN Energy Direction
data_items.rule: Energy Direction of the Linked MPANs | Notes: I = Import E= Export

data_items.name: Import/Export MPAN Supplier DIP ID
data_items.rule: DIP ID of the Supplier Responsible for the Linked MPAN | Notes: Mandatory if available in Registration Service

data_items.name: Import/Export MPAN Supplier MPID
data_items.rule: Import/Export MPAN Supplier MPID | Notes: Mandatory if available in Registration Service

data_items.title: B037 block below are repeated for each Related MPAN, where Related MPAN(s) exist

data_items.name: Primary MPAN
data_items.rule:
The primary in a related MPAN relationship. The primary is associated with the base load settlement configuration (contains no value, if not part of related MPAN pair). | Notes: Either Or should be populated where MPAN (DI-063 above) is part of a group of Related MPANs

"B037" should be repeated for each Related MPAN

data_items.name: Secondary MPAN
data_items.rule: The secondary in a related MPAN relationship.

name: Notification of Annual Consumption
description: On a monthly basis the Market-wide Data Service will calculate an Annual Consumption for each MPAN. This interface is to notify participants of the value, quality and calculation date of that consumption.
receiver: Suppliers (SUP), Data Service (SDS, ADS, UMSDS), LDSO, Registration Service (REGS) & EES
context: On a monthly basis the Market-wide Data Service will calculate an Annual Consumption for each MPAN. This interface is to notify participants of the value, quality and calculation date of that consumption.

name: Smart / Advanced Readings
description: New Interface to exchange Exchange, Smart and Smart COR Meter Readings between MHHS Parties
receiver: Advanced Data Service (ADS) and Smart Data Service (SDS) / Supplier (SUP)/ LDSO
context: This interface is to allow Cumulative Reads and/or, Smart/Advanced Register Redings, to be exchanged in a number of business scenarios. Following MHHS implementation, in most cases consumption values will be available directly from the meter. However, there may be occasions when consumption may not be available, therefore a Cumulative Reading will need to be captured/shared as a 'fall back' measure

data_items.name: Interface Id
data_items.rule: Interface Id | Notes: IF-041

data_items.rule: The Scheme Version against which the message has been constructed | Notes: nnn

data_items.name: Event Code
data_items.rule: Code used to identify the nature of the Event | Notes: [ReadingRemv], [ReadingInstl], [ReadingEnergisationChg], [ReadingCOR], [ReadingOnSite], [ReadingCOS], [DSEstimate], [SupplierAgreedCOS], [ReadingOverride], [ReadingRemote]

data_items.title: * B064 - Cumulative Reading Information (Conditionally Mandatory) - Block Repeated for each Meter(s) associated with the MPAN

data_items.name: Meter ID
data_items.rule: Serial number of the physical meter.

data_items.name: Cumulative Register Reading
data_items.rule: The value of the Cumulative meter register at a specified date and time. | Notes: e.g. 123456789.123

data_items.name: Cumulative Register Reading Date / Time
data_items.rule: The date and time [in UTC] of the Cumulative Register Meter Read. | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM This should be considered to be midnight where an exact time is unavailible

data_items.name: Reading Method
data_items.rule: Indicates how the Cumulative meter reading was obtained/derived | Notes: A -Actual Data Recovered from Meter C - Customer E- Estimate by SDS S - Estimate by Supplier X - Derived Reading (Based on Actual) Y - Dervied Reading (Based in Estimate)

data_items.name: Site Visit Check Code
data_items.rule: A code identifying either nature of checks made/to be made on metering equipment during a site visit or identifying reason for failure to obtain readings. | Notes: Ref Data Catalogue for valid values

data_items.title: * B065 - Meter Configurable Register Reading (Conditionally Mandatory) - Block Repeated for each set of Configured Register(s) for each Meter

data_items.name: Meter ID
data_items.rule: Serial number of the physical meter.

data_items.name: Configurable Register Reading Date /Time
data_items.rule: The date and time [in UTC] of a Configurable Register Meter Read. This should be considered to be midnight where an exact time is unavailible | Notes: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM.SS±TZH:TZM

data_items.name: Configurable Register ID
data_items.rule: Register ID relating to a specific configurable (billing) register on a Smart/Advanced Meter | Notes: nn

data_items.name: Configurable Register Reading
data_items.rule: Reading associated to a specific Register ID on a Smart/Advanced Meter | Notes: e.g. 123456789.123
